author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR follows up the review of #38730. I profiled the `unordered_multimap`
* before https://mkortela.web.cern.ch/mkortela/cgi-bin/navigator/issue38725/hlt_ConditionalTask_36_perf/14
* after https://mkortela.web.cern.ch/mkortela/cgi-bin/navigator/issue38725/hlt_ConditionalTask_46_perf/14

but within the precision of the test it is hard to say if it improved the performance (I'd expect these change to have no impact on the time of `edm::(anonymous namespace)::getWorker()`).

#### PR validation:

The aforementioned profile.
title: Follow up review comments in EDAlias, SwitchProducer, ConditionalTask PR
